channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: Why Russia’s “disconnection” from the Internet isn’t amounting to much. https://t.co/zKaZcVZhqR
@KevinCTofel @tylerjtofel Where's @ohnorm?
@markjgardner it's still kind of funny.
Do you ever say thank you to Alexa? I just started today.
“Perfectly targeted advertising is just information.” https://t.co/K44lgBJiv1
The Covid-19 Pandemic Didn’t Have to Be This Way. https://t.co/STqvBsUlpA
Portrait of Zelensky by Joan Baez. https://t.co/35NoiynVPj
WE ARE RUNNING AGAINST PUTIN IN THE US.

why did the sanctions against putin work so well this time?
because it was a way to spend money to keep trump out of the white house. more than putin what everyone in the world is most scared about is that this is just a temporary reprieve from the authoritarian united states.
the world democracies are getting a second chance.
but -- important point --
ONLY IF PUTIN IS *THE* ISSUE IN ALL UPCOMING ELECTIONS UNTIL HE'S A DISTANT MEMORY

If the Dems had a good marketer, they would be running against Putin. The ads would be running now. So many great pictures.
Remember #moscowmitch? He looks sharp in a Russian military uniform. https://t.co/gIqoOQtDLh
Remember this guy? He's going to kill Roe v Wade, maybe before the election. https://t.co/AAQiyKdVgl
I love this picture. The Donald in his element. What sweet photo. I think they're in love. https://t.co/3jgBfkLLme
And then there were the Republicans who spent July 4 in Moscow. Do you think they might have been selling us out. Maybe they should move to Moscow. They certainly shouldn't be in Congress. https://t.co/YgokRrocIC
There's this great scene in The West Wing.
Bartlet says to the Repub, let's have a great campaign, really get at the issues.
Crime, boy I don't know.
https://t.co/n3SlAw5hQx
Bartlet decides to kick his ass.
Come on. They tee'd this one up for us.
McCaul: 'I'm astounded that Zelensky’s still alive' https://t.co/qOYAv0yvuD
Jeff Zucker Scandal: Inside the CNN President's Downfall. https://t.co/U0AjiMKf3J

How I solved today's Wordle. I try to eliminate all the vowels and popular consonants in the first two moves. Then when I got the last four letters, like most people did, I only had two choices for consonants left that worked. https://t.co/6mArdHqVpG
An example of the brave Russian military -- they killed the security guard at a shoe factory, and his dog. https://t.co/mGomhpLefs
@fxshaw this was an emotional wordle for many people
@searchlight5 campaign on it.

1/4 I heard a plausible theory why Garland et al haven't indicted Trump. They think it'll give him a new platform, a new cause. He'll fundraise like crazy. Something to campaign on in November and in 2024. But I see a silver lining. Let him campaign in 2022, and make the issue
2/4 about whether the US wants to go where Russia is. Do we want a Putinite running the US? If so, vote for Trump. Let's have an election about what it's really about for a change. Straight out, do you want to be ruled by an autocrat or do you want to keep trying to create a more
3/4 perfect union? I think a very compelling campaign could be had. And if, in the end, the people want to be ruled by an autocrat, then that's where we're going next. I don't think it'll last very long, when Americans find out what it really means. There's a good chance it all
4/4 falls apart when the Supreme Court overturns Roe.
Router and modem rental fees still a major annoyance despite new US law. https://t.co/IrTCB12lJt

To any Russians who might be listening, or American fans of Putin. Putin is a coward. He can't beat Ukraine's military, so he picks a fight with their mothers, children and old people. He's a piece of human shit.
@NYTAnon Maybe Xi thought Putin would stick to fighting Ukraine’s military, not their mothers, children and old people.
Twitter unveils version of site that can bypass Russia block. https://t.co/mNwOm6rLju
@GuySie I don’t think you understood what I was saying
50 Photos That Prove the '70s Was the Decade With the Best Style. https://t.co/7KoTCkB1Ji
Brian Eno Creates a List of 20 Books That Could Rebuild Civilization. https://t.co/ZJ0uSEaHI8
